name: 3 Minutes to Survive
description:
This game was made in 48h for MINI JAM 117: GHOSTS. I can't do all the things I would like to do within this time but I did my best, I hope you have fun!

Mrs. Nena needs to withstand 3 minutes of furious attacks from the ghosts chasing her. To resist, she will have to use her holy shotgun.

CONTROL

  • MOVE: W,A,S,D.
  • SHOT: Left Mouse Button

Game by Róger Goulart (@roger_goulart)
